decisions.reasoning: The user is saying that when they share their blog post URL on LinkedIn, the link preview doesn't show the article's image. This is because LinkedIn (and other social platforms) use Open Graph meta tags to determine the preview image, title, and description. The blog post page needs `og:image`, `og:title`, `og:description` meta tags in the `<head>`.
